description: Try our easy to follow Layered Cheesecake With Tropical Fruit & Rum recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Layered Cheesecake With Tropical Fruit & Rum
name: Layered Cheesecake With Tropical Fruit & Rum Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Layer cream mixture, biscuits, rum (if using), mango and passionfruit pulp in four 500ml serving glasses. Repeat layers. Serve immediately or cover with plastic wrap and refrigerate for several hours or until ready to serve. Top with meringues just before serving.

Layer cream mixture, biscuits, rum (if using), mango and passionfruit pulp in four 500ml serving glasses. Repeat layers. Serve immediately or cover with plastic wrap and refrigerate for several hours or until ready to serve. Top with meringues just before serving.
